_header: My sovereign Savior to Thee I call
Title(s): ‘þe prayere of þe pilgryme þat he sayes afore his deth’; Pèlerinage de la Vie Humaine
Subjects: prayers, at time of death; death, approach of
_description: ‘þe prayere of þe pilgryme þat he sayes afore his deth’: poem occurring in only this MS of the English translation of the Pèlerinage de la Vie Humaine — twelve stanzas rhyme royal

MelSLV096G94.First Lines: My soverayn saveoure to þe I calle…
